meanings: stupid, foolish, idiotic, (informal) dumb, (informal) thickheaded, (impolite) half-witted

vlive.korean: 애초에 이런 라임을 잡고 랩을 쓰면 그건 멍청한 거! 못 해! If you try to make a rap with this word, that's not a good idea. You can't do it! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 집가기시룬🐖🐇
vlive.english: If you try to make a rap with this word, that's not a good idea. You can't do it!

vlive.korean: 너 그렇게 멍청한 애였어? I think you are better than this. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 일진과의 첫번째 데이트 [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP10
vlive.english: I think you are better than this.

vlive.korean: 너가 멍청한 거야! - 오늘 배틀 한번 떠? You're dumb. - You want to battle with me? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 돌아온 산밍키😍
vlive.english: You're dumb. - You want to battle with me?

vlive.korean: 그래 이 멍청한 놈들아! Yeah, you idiots! 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [남자사람친구 14일전]_2화 | 교복 입은 모습에 떨릴 줄 몰랐다
더러워~ - 멍청한 단무지? Disgusting. - Dumb pickled radish? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.07
